prompt: In a lively yet tranquil suburban neighborhood, an expansive modern house stands as a perfect blend of luxury and practicality. The sizable structure is a testament to innovative architecture, featuring clean lines and a harmonious blend of natural stone and polished wood. A grand double door, framed by wide glass panels, marks the entrance, inviting visitors into a sunlit foyer adorned with minimalist furniture and art. The exterior showcases a meticulously landscaped garden, complete with pathways lined by vibrant flowering shrubs and a small koi pond reflecting the clear blue sky. Captured from a slightly elevated angle, the photograph highlights the house's imposing yet welcoming fa√ßade, centered in the composition to accentuate its symmetrical design. The camera lens captures the subtle undulations of the driveway leading to a discreet garage. The image is taken at the golden hour, with the soft glow of the setting sun casting long, gentle shadows across the patio area, where sleek outdoor furniture sits on a terracotta-tiled floor. The natural light enhances the warm tones of the wood and stone, creating a serene yet sophisticated atmosphere. A palette of earthy browns, soft grays, and muted greens dominates the scene, setting a calm, inviting mood that speaks to the comfort and elegance of suburban living. This masterfully composed shot is rendered in a crisp, high-definition format that conveys every detail with stunning clarity, reflecting the precision and skill of professional architectural photography. The style echoes the clean and unfussy approach of contemporary design aesthetics, establishing the property as both a functional home and a work of art.
